backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a mobile banking backend with user profile management, wallet operations (deposit, withdraw, transfer), and role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (dashboard top bar, balance card, quick actions, recent transactions, etc.) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and contents of each component, page, hook, and utility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart palette, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'BlueStone Bank' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, handles authentication via Internet Identity and hardcoded demo credentials, and renders a two-panel login portal before granting dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/AccountsOverview: Displays a two-card grid showing live checking balance (fetched from backend) and a dummy savings balance, each styled with dark navy gradients, masked account numbers, and accent-colored icons.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Displays a styled balance card with a toggle to show/hide the formatted balance amount, user greeting, and decorative UI elements.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Form component for submitting a deposit with amount and description fields, including validation and a confirmation dialog before executing the mutation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout wrapper providing a sticky header with navigation links and login button, responsive mobile menu, main content area, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate loading, login, or logout states.
frontend/src/components/MobileBalanceCar: Mobile-specific balance card that fetches and displays the user's balance and greeting with a loading skeleton state.
Fixed bottom navigation bar for mobile with Home, Accounts, Payments, and More tabs, navigating to routes or showing a coming-soon toast.
frontend/src/components/MobileQuickActio: Mobile quick-action buttons for Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, and Pay Bills, navigating to routes or showing a coming-soon toast.
frontend/src/components/MobileRecentTran: Displays the five most recent transactions on mobile with type-specific icons, relative dates, and loading skeletons, linking to the full transaction history.
frontend/src/components/MobileTopBar.tsx: Mobile top bar displaying a hamburger menu button, centered brand name, and a notification bell with an unread count badge.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for new users to create their profile by entering name, email, and password, with validation and submission via the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/QuickActions.tsx: Renders a grid of quick-action buttons (Transfer, Deposit, Bill Pay, Top-up) that navigate to routes or show a 'coming soon' toast.
frontend/src/components/RecentTransactio: Displays a list of recent transactions with icons, amounts, and dates, showing skeletons while loading and a 'View All' link to the transactions page.
frontend/src/components/TransactionConfi: An alert dialog that shows a summary of a pending transaction (type, amount, recipient, description) and lets the user confirm or cancel it.
frontend/src/components/TransactionFilte: Provides two select dropdowns for filtering transactions by type and sorting them by date or amount.
frontend/src/components/TransactionTable: Renders a paginated table of transactions with type icons, badges, descriptions, dates, and color-coded amounts.
frontend/src/components/TransferForm.tsx: A form for initiating a fund transfer by entering a recipient Principal ID, amount, and optional description, with validation and a confirmation dialog before submission.
frontend/src/components/VirtualCard.tsx: Renders a flippable virtual bank card UI component showing cardholder name, masked card number, expiry, and a styled back face with CVV strip.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Form component for submitting a withdrawal with amount and optional description, including validation and a confirmation dialog before executing the mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Custom hook that fetches the user's account balance from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useFilteredTransactio: Custom hook that provides client-side filtering by transaction type and sorting of a transactions array, returning derived state and setters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for account initialization, deposit, withdrawal, and transfer operations, each invalidating balance and transaction caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Custom hook that fetches the list of transactions from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Custom hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via React Query, with loading state derived from both actor and query status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base layers, a BlueStone Bank dark-navy-and-gold CSS custom property theme for light and dark modes, and card flip/balance blur animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that fetches balance and transactions, auto-initializes new accounts, and renders a mobile banking layout with top bar, balance card, quick actions, recent transactions, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Deposit page with a back-to-dashboard button and a card container wrapping the DepositForm component.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Transaction history page that fetches all transactions, applies filtering/sorting via useFilteredTransactions, and renders them in a TransactionTable with TransactionFilters controls.
frontend/src/pages/TransferPage.tsx: Transfer page with a back-to-dashboard button and a card container wrapping the TransferForm component.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Withdraw page with a back-to-dashboard button and a card container wrapping the WithdrawForm component.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting bigint values as USD currency, nanosecond timestamps as human-readable dates, and capitalizing transaction type strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL/hash query parameters, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without page reload.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation helpers for amount strings, ICP Principal IDs, and email addresses, each returning a ValidationResult with an optional error message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom oklch-based colors (navy, gold, semantic tokens), border radii, box shadows, fonts, and animation keyframes, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the Bluestone Bank mobile banking app's version, architectural notes, and implemented features such as the dashboard layout, balance card, quick actions, and recent transactions.
